name: snn0d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(csn(c0), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wne(csn(c0), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(csn(c0), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wne(csn(c0), emptycls))

|- wi(w0, wne(csn(c0), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

comment: The singleton of a set is not empty. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
